actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to permit individuals who are residents in certain public institutions to receive supplementary security income benefits.

summary.text: Permits individuals who are residents in skilled nursing facilities, nursing homes, intermediate care facilities, or residential facilities to receive supplementary security income benefits under title XVI of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to permit individuals who are residents in certain public institutions to receive supplementary security income benefits.
